00019 #include <string>
00020 #include "gmxtrajectorywriter.h"
00021 
00022 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00023 
00024 void GMXTrajectoryWriter::Open(string file, bool bAppend)
00025 {
00026     set_program_name("VOTCA");
00027 
00028     //char c[1] = bAppend ? "a" : "w";
00029     _file = open_trx((char *)file.c_str(), "w");
00030 }
00031 
00032 void GMXTrajectoryWriter::Close()
00033 {
00034     close_trx(_file);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void GMXTrajectoryWriter::Write(Topology *conf)
00038 {
00039     static int step=0;   
00040     int N = conf->BeadCount();
00041     t_trxframe frame;
00042     rvec *x = new rvec[N];
00043     matrix box = conf->getBox();
00044     
00045     frame.natoms = N;
00046     frame.bTime = true;
00047     frame.time = conf->getTime();
00048     frame.bStep = true;
00049     frame.step = conf->getStep();;
00050     frame.x = x;
00051     frame.bTitle=false;
00052     frame.bLambda=false;
00053     frame.bAtoms=false;
00054     frame.bPrec=false;
00055     frame.bX = true;
00056     frame.bV=false;
00057     frame.bF=false;
00058     frame.bBox=true;
00059 
00060     for(int i=0; i<3; i++)
00061         for(int j=0; j<3; j++)
00062             frame.box[i][j] = box[i][j];
00063     
00064     
00065 for(int i=0; i<N; ++i) {
00066         vec v = conf->getBead(i)->getPos();
00067         x[i][0] = v.getX();
00068         x[i][1] = v.getY();
00069         x[i][2] = v.getZ(); 
00070     }
00071         
00072 #if GMX == 50
00073     write_trxframe(_file, &frame, NULL);
00074 #elif GMX == 45
00075     write_trxframe(_file, &frame, NULL);
00076 #elif GMX == 40
00077     write_trxframe(_file, &frame);
00078 #else
00079 #error Unsupported GMX version
00080 #endif
00081     
00082     step++;
00083     delete[] x;
00084 }
00085 
00086 }}
